overview: For his first Treasure Island Media release, London sleaze-master Liam Cole seduces handsome Londoners into the world-wide Paul Morris sperm-cult. Under the sway of Cole, every man goes further than he's gone before. 18-year-old Tommy Haine is hypnotized to be a cum slut… Closet bi-guy Ralph swallows loads for us, behind his girl friend's back… Carl Jacobs ruins his career to get spunk-fucked for the entire world to see. Whether they're getting trance-fucked, chugging down jizz-loads, or getting raw-fucked by hung uncut studs, these guys are all under Liam Cole's Bad Influence.
tagline: All Real • All Raw • All Raunch
title: Bad Influence
